name: Watching
author: Jeffrey Jay Levin
desc: An immersive time travel by flashback story with Cold Case meets Medium vs. the mob vibes.

name: The Savage
author: Kris Nedy
desc: Born on a Pacific island ruled by ferocious cannibals, Kamolea is bound to an age-old prophecy that calls him to challenge his tribe’s dark legacy

name: Leadership Superpowers
author: Gregor Purdyn
desc: Gregor Purdy introduces a practical system for diagnosing your unique leadership needs and transforming your impact in just 90 days.

name: A Journey to the Centre of the Earth
author: Jules Verne
desc: It is a classic science fiction novel by Jules Verne.

name: Cataclysm
author: Violet May
desc: Cataclysm is a confessional journey into the mind of a man suffering loneliness and becoming tormented with obsession.

name: Darker Than Blood
author: Taylor Marsh
desc: One stored snapshot squats in my brain. Sent me into panic fifteen years ago. No through line to alter my confusion.

name: The Funeral Train
author: James Leonard
desc: When a funeral train brings coffins engraved with the names of the living, Snow Jacobs is forced to face a vengeful outlaw and his own past.

name: The Serpent Woman
author: SZ Estavillo
desc: A serial killer is on the loose—known only as The Serpent Woman.

name: Death Pose
author: D.P. Conway
desc: A killer who stages his victims like works of art. A detective who refuses to look away.
